name: breathe
desc: Breathing exercises are a real thing! Backed by science, they calm down the body. Just take 10 deep breaths

name: exercise
desc: Blow off some steam! Exercise is one of the healthiest ways to do that

name: movie
desc: It's amazing how a good movie can distract the mind and relax the body

name: write
desc: Write down your frustrations. Documenting your thoughts can be very therapeutic

name: exercise
desc: Get some exercise for about 30 minutes

name: comedy
desc: Try to laugh off your angry feelings away by watching a funny movie or a show

name: letter
desc: Write a forgiveness letter or email

name: change
desc: Go get a change of scenery for 5 minutes

name: write
desc: Write down all the things that are upsetting you on a piece of paper, then rip it up

name: game
desc: Go play any kind of game with your friends

name: socialize
desc: Even if you're upset, good friends don't let that last long. Go have some fun
